description:
Scenario:
-----------
1. Have RetryFilter enabled in nova.conf filter options
2. Use --availability_zone :host-foo boot parameter when booting a VM
3. host-foo encountered a problem during its nova-compute spawn (e.g., storage problem)
4. nova-scheduler, because an exception was encountered, tries to find a new host
title: Targeted deployments still try to 'find a new host' if nova-compute encounters an error

    Disable retry filter with force_hosts or force_nodes
    
    If customer deploy a VM with force_hosts or force_nodes options,
    then there is no need to retry even if retry filter was enabled.
    
    Fix bug 1211597
